title: 1.3 Master Challenge 3
question:
Given below is the formula to calculate the commission of a salesperson:

For example, if a salesperson made $30,000 worth of sales and his commission rate is 5 percent, his commission payment would be $1,500.
Write a program to calculate the commission. Ask the user to enter the amount and commission percentage. Then, print the sales commission as an output of the program.
Here is an example:
